title: Pump.fun Raises $600M in 12-Minute Token Sale
summary: Pump.fun successfully raised $600 million in just 12 minutes by selling 15% of its 1 trillion PUMP token supply at $0.004 per token. This rapid fundraising demonstrates significant market demand and positions the protocol with substantial capital for development.

title: BTC Digital Establishes $1M Ethereum Reserve for DeFi Expansion
summary: Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin mining firm BTC Digital announced a $1 million Ethereum reserve as part of their strategic expansion into Ethereum's onchain ecosystem. The company plans to engage with DeFi protocols, stablecoins, and asset tokenization initiatives.

title: ETH Strategy Acquires 6,900 ETH to Build Largest Onchain Treasury
summary: Autonomous protocol ETH Strategy purchased 6,900 ETH as it aims to create the largest onchain ETH treasury, with presale backing from Ethereum OGs and DAOs at 1 ETH for 10,000 STRAT. The funds will seed their treasury, bootstrap liquidity, and launch a convertible note program while developing new onchain volatility trading strategies.

title: GATES Inc Tokenizes $75M Tokyo Real Estate on Oasys Blockchain
summary: GATES Inc is tokenizing $75 million worth of Tokyo real estate on the Oasys blockchain, with ambitious plans to scale to over $200 billion (1% of Japan's property market). With $145M in revenue and preparing for NASDAQ listing, GATES' choice of Oasys marks the gaming chain's significant entry into real-world asset tokenization.

title: Jerome Powell Resignation Rumors Could Impact Bitcoin Price
summary: Speculation about Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's potential resignation suggests Trump could appoint a new figure favoring easier monetary policy. This scenario could lead to rate cuts, increased inflation, dollar devaluation, and potentially boost Bitcoin prices.
